types1:Item.types1:Name: SFDC_Order_to_NS_Sales_Order
types1:Item.types1:Description: Create Sales Order in NetSuite(Infa dev).

process.name: SFDC_Order_to_NS_Sales_Order
process.description: Create Sales Order in NetSuite(Infa dev).

query.where: OrderId = '{$Id}' AND Ignore_Sync__c != true AND Net_Total_Price__c < 0 AND SBQQ__ContractAction__c not in ('Quantity Decrease','Cancel') LIMIT 2000

assignment.title: Assign Existing BillTo Subsidiary to temp Field

query.where: OpportunityId = '{$OpportunityId}' AND IsPrimary = true AND Contact.Email != ''

operation.expression: if($EULA_Region__c='Americas') then '1' else if($EULA_Region__c='APAC' or $EULA_Region__c='EMEA') then '9' else ''

query.where: OrderId = '{$Id}' AND Ignore_Sync__c != true AND SBQQ__ContractAction__c not in ('Quantity Decrease','Cancel') LIMIT 2000
OrderId = '{$Id}' AND Payment_Schedule_Details__c = 'Custom' AND SBQQ__ContractAction__c not in ('Quantity Decrease','Cancel') Limit 1

assignment.title: Assign Exception - Order Line Amount < 0
assignment.operation: Orders with negative line amounts will not be synced to Netsuite. There are {list:count($temp.temp_orderProducts)} negative lines for this order.
Orders with negative line amounts will not be synced to Netsuite. There are {list:count($temp.temp_orderProducts)} negative lines for this order.

service.title: Check for Existing Opportunity in NS

assignment.title: Assign Exception - Opp Already Exists
assignment.operation: An Order already exists in Netsuite for that opportunity, {$output.search_SalesOrder_tranId}. Either update the Order Reference Number in SFDC with Netsuite SO number or cancel the order in Netsuite and re-sync again from SFDC.

An Order already exists in Netsuite for that opportunity, {$output.search_SalesOrder_tranId}. Either update the Order Reference Number in SFDC with Netsuite SO number or cancel the order in Netsuite and re-sync again from SFDC.

assignment.title: Add Billing Country if lookup returns non null

operation.expression: if($EULA_Region__c='Americas') then '1' else if($EULA_Region__c='APAC' or $EULA_Region__c='EMEA') then '9' else ''

assignment.title: Add blank value to Billing Country
Add Shipping Country if lookup returns non null

operation.expression: if($Ship_to_Subsidiary__c='AppDynamics, Inc.') then '1' else if($Ship_to_Subsidiary__c='AppDynamics UK2') then '9' else ''

assignment.title: Add blank value to Shipping Country
Add internal ID of Subsidiary if lookup returns non null
Add blank to Subsidiary internal ID
Add temp_OpptyCurrencyNSId if lookup returns non null

container.title: Parent billTo Doesn't Exist in Netsuite

subflow.title: billTo - SFDC To NS - Sales Order - Parent Customer

assignment.title: Assign billTo Parent to temp Field

container.title: Parent shipTo Doesn't Exist in Netsuite?

subflow.title: shipTo - SFDC To NS - Sales Order - Parent Customer

assignment.title: Assign shipTo Parent to temp Field

container.title: Bill to Account NetSuite Id Null?

parameter.name: url
parameter.expression: if(exists($Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website)) then (if(fn:substring($Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website, 1,7) eq 'http://') then $Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website else fn:concat("http://", $Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website)) else ()

assignment.title: Assign new NetSuite ID to SFDC Account

parameter.name: email
parameter.expression: if(fn:string-length($output.email)>0) then '' else if($BillToContact.Email!='') then $BillToContact.Email else $temp.temp_OppContact_Email

assignment.title: Assignment to faultstring
assignment.operation: Customer not found for update at update bill-to customer step

container.title: Bill to Account NetSuite Id Null?

service.title: Create Bill-to Customer with different address

parameter.name: url
parameter.expression: if(exists($Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website)) then (if(fn:substring($Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website, 1,7) eq 'http://') then $Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website else fn:concat("http://", $Bill_To__r.Account__r.Website)) else ()

assignment.title: Assign new NetSuite ID to SFDC Account

parameter.name: email
parameter.expression: if(fn:string-length($output.email)>0) then '' else if($BillToContact.Email!='') then $BillToContact.Email else $temp.temp_OppContact_Email

assignment.title: Assignment to faultstring
assignment.operation: Customer not found for update at update bill-to/ship-to step

parameter.name: url

container.title: Ship To Account NetSuite Id Null?

parameter.name: url
parameter.expression: if(exists($Ship_To__r.Account__r.Website)) then (if(fn:substring($Ship_To__r.Account__r.Website, 1,7) eq 'http://') then $Ship_To__r.Account__r.Website else fn:concat("http://", $Ship_To__r.Account__r.Website)) else ()

assignment.title: Assign to Netsuite Id to Ship-to Account

parameter.name: email
parameter.expression: if(fn:string-length($output.email)>0) then '' else if($ShipToContact.Email!='') then $ShipToContact.Email else $temp.temp_OppContact_Email
